title: Chroma Bugs?
body:
Not 100% sure, but this is the 3rd day in a row i haven't been able to access my cottontail teemo chroma skin for some reason, i play mostly arams... 

this a server bug? didnt think much of it at first incase it was a client bug and i was being too lazy to refresh, but 3days now, chroma still missing...

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support about this issue as we here on the boards are unable to assist with account-related issues.
